name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: The EpisodeOfCare may be known by different identifiers for different contexts of use, such as when an external agency is tracking the Episode for funding purposes.

name: $addidentifier
desc: The EpisodeOfCare may be known by different identifiers for different contexts of use, such as when an external agency is tracking the Episode for funding purposes.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The EpisodeOfCare may be known by different identifiers for different contexts of use, such as when an external agency is tracking the Episode for funding purposes.

name: $status
desc: Returns: planned | waitlist | active | onhold | finished | cancelled.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: planned | waitlist | active | onhold | finished | cancelled.

name: $statusHistory
desc: Returns: The history of statuses that the EpisodeOfCare has been through (without requiring processing the history of the resource).

name: $addstatusHistory
desc: The history of statuses that the EpisodeOfCare has been through (without requiring processing the history of the resource).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The history of statuses that the EpisodeOfCare has been through (without requiring processing the history of the resource).

name: $::type
desc: Returns: A classification of the type of episode of care; e.g. specialist referral, disease management, type of funded care.

name: $addtype
desc: A classification of the type of episode of care; e.g. specialist referral, disease management, type of funded care.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A classification of the type of episode of care; e.g. specialist referral, disease management, type of funded care.

name: $diagnosis
desc: Returns: The list of diagnosis relevant to this episode of care.

name: $adddiagnosis
desc: The list of diagnosis relevant to this episode of care.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The list of diagnosis relevant to this episode of care.

name: $patient
desc: Returns: The patient who is the focus of this episode of care.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The patient who is the focus of this episode of care.

name: $managingOrganization
desc: Returns: The organization that has assumed the specific responsibilities for the specified duration.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The organization that has assumed the specific responsibilities for the specified duration.

name: $period
desc: Returns: The interval during which the managing organization assumes the defined responsibility.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The interval during which the managing organization assumes the defined responsibility.

name: $referralRequest
desc: Returns: Referral Request(s) that are fulfilled by this EpisodeOfCare, incoming referrals.

name: $addreferralRequest
desc: Referral Request(s) that are fulfilled by this EpisodeOfCare, incoming referrals.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Referral Request(s) that are fulfilled by this EpisodeOfCare, incoming referrals.

name: $careManager
desc: Returns: The practitioner that is the care manager/care co-ordinator for this patient.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The practitioner that is the care manager/care co-ordinator for this patient.

name: $team
desc: Returns: The list of practitioners that may be facilitating this episode of care for specific purposes.

name: $addteam
desc: The list of practitioners that may be facilitating this episode of care for specific purposes.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The list of practitioners that may be facilitating this episode of care for specific purposes.

name: $account
desc: Returns: The set of accounts that may be used for billing for this EpisodeOfCare.

name: $addaccount
desc: The set of accounts that may be used for billing for this EpisodeOfCare.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The set of accounts that may be used for billing for this EpisodeOfCare.
